description: Scoring rules for Spending Personality classification. Derived from survey and spending behavior data. Q&A with scoring logic will determine personality assignment

Saver.description: Low-income, budget-conscious shoppers. Prefer in-store shopping, moderate to high deal use, and make small, infrequent purchases.
tips: Focus on essential needs before discretionary spending.
Use digital coupons and loyalty programs to stretch your budget.
Track small expenses monthly to stay on goal.

Planner.description: Balanced and mindful shoppers with moderate income. They plan purchases ahead, shop both online and in-store, and occasionally use deals.
tips: Keep a monthly budget and track progress regularly.
Use a wishlist before buying non-essentials.

Splurger.description: High-income, premium spenders who enjoy quality and convenience over discounts. They spend more per purchase and rarely seek deals.
tips: Set aside a fixed percentage of income for luxury or leisure spending.
Review annual expenses to identify overspending areas.

Impulse Buyer.description: Frequent online shoppers who make spontaneous purchases with little price comparison. Spend more impulsively across digital channels.
tips: Wait 24 hours before major online purchases.
Use shopping lists to stay intentional.
